content.rendered:
Directed by Jean Paul Lal

Written by Sachy

Cast Prithviraj Sukumaran (Hareendran). Suraj Venjaramoodu (Kuruvila Joseph). Miya George (Elsa (as Mia George)). Deepti Sati (Bhama). Saiju Kurup (Johnny Peringodan). Vijayaraghavan (Self). Idavela Babu (Self). Abhishek Chouksey (Self). Salim Kumar (Agasthi). Innocent (Self (voice)). Arun (Movie Director). Suresh Krishna (Bhadran). Shivaji Guruvayoor (Shiva G.). Sohan Seenulal (Ananthu Panicker). Mridul Nair (Kabeer). Major Ravi (Samuel Jackson). Vijayakumar (Joseph Unniyadan). Lalu Alex (Jagannatha Varma). Nandu Poduval (Production Controller). Aneesh Menon (Sageer). Angel Shijoy (Deepti Sati (voice)). Sunil Babu (Murugan). Nandu (Kunjali). Adhish Praveen (Jinto). Shafique Rahiman (News Channel Reporter). Kalabhavan Haneef (Pillai). Mafia Sasi (Self – Stunt Director). Boban Alumoodan (Kottukappalli). Kalabhavan Navas (Menon). Shibin Francis (Director 2). Samarth Ambujakshan (Police Officer). Ardra (Reporter 7). Thomas (Negihbour). Paul (Advocate). C.A. Vipin (Traffic Police 1). Riya (Reporter 9). Baijukuttan (Servant). Sulfeekar (Reporter 14). Salaludheen (Reporter 17). Balu.(M.V.I 4). Anil.S. Raj (Bhadran’s Movie D.O.P). Niyas (Hari’s Assistant 2). Jineesha (Reporter 13). Bobby (Sub-Inspector 2). Abhirami (Reporter 5). Sabin (Dance Master 2). Akhil (Reporter 21). Shyam (Car Boy). Praveen (Hari’s Friend 2). Sahin Antony (Reporter 1). Prasanth (Hari’s Assistant 1). Subhash (Traffic Police 2). Sneha (Reporter 22). Vinod Kumar (Villian). Jose Kutty (Reporter 3). Hussain (Hari’s Assistant 3). Vishnu (Reporter 20). Niyas.(M.V.I 2). Kiran (Reporter 15). Saiju (Reporter 10). Smitha (Reporter 4). Delu (House Maid). Bhoopathi Raj (Dance Master). Khais Mohammed (Franko). Jisha Rajan (Bhadran’s Movie Assistant’S 2Assistant’S 2). V.S. Nisanth (Location Boy 2). Jojo Aluva (Bhadran’s Movie Director). Jissan (Reporter 8). Priya (Reporter 19). Unni Karthikeyan (Driving School Owner). Merin (Reporter 11). Antony (Reporter 12). S. Subin (Location Tea Man). Cici (Reporter 6). Divya (Hari’s Friend 1). Lalu.(M.V.1 3). Sibin (Reporter 16). Manu Bala (Bhadran’s Movie Associate). Shalu (Reporter 18). Navneet Sreedhar (Bhadran’s. Movie Assistant’S 1). Sachin Lal (Studio Recordist). Allan La (Hari’s Assistant). Joshy.(M.V.I 1)

Languages Malayalam

Producers Abhishek Chouksey. Supriya Menon. Listin Stephen

Production Prithviraj Production
